name: QuVerse
description:
QuVerse is exciting and challenging action matching puzzle.
Basic rule is very simple, Make top of Cube to same color.
but this world's system is unstable, for matching color of Cube, you should move Logically and swiftly.
Challenge your limit, break the record!

Key Features:
  • Very exciting and high speed action puzzle
  • Dynamic changing fields
  • 30 puzzle stages
  • 3 type Challenge mode
  • Infinity Score Attack
